snippet.title: Far Horizon - Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Far Horizon is an open-world, action-adventure RPG set in the far reaches of space where floating islands, beautiful vistas, and alien creatures await.

Embark on an epic adventure of exploration, ingenuity, and survival! Rebuild your ship as you loot, shoot, and craft to forge your destiny in the stars.
